question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. cyclist
B. traffic light
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The cyclist is in the foreground on the left, while the traffic light is on a pole in the background on the right, making the cyclist clearly closer to the camera.
